replies.body: Anime was a mistake, it is nothing but trash.
https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/09497d67cb6d4a76f4bc99c1520490b829d9188cbcf355dbce613a0f077bec6c.jpg

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/051/552/632.png
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/926/994/729.gif

Too bad that's not my favorite anime...

http://pm1.narvii.com/5625/1b625b140812d5cbec24c49ff635d9e658103bdb_hq.jpg

For me it was fine... until they started walking on top of the spacetime itself while using galaxies as frisbee.

Then I was like...
http://artfcity.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/10/raise-eyebrows.gif
Yeah.
So all of it except for five minutes of the last episode...
No, I meant the show up until the ending was like 7/10, but with the ending it went down by a notch.
For me, the whole show was an 9.5/10, mostly since I grew up on action movies and anime and this combined the two, the final ending, after like the 50 year time skip brought it down to a 8.5/10

I also grew up on action movies and I do like action anime, but when the power creep is so huge, it ends up being a parody.

Let's say the parody isn't always nice.

Or perhaps I should rate it as if it was a parody first and foremost?
I think the point of Gurren Lagann's over the topness, was to have it be so over the top that it just becomes like a meme. Somewhat like DBZ over excessive yelling.

I remembered DBZ as the anime version of the Bold and the Beautiful.

It goes on and on and on and on and...

Are they still on Namek?
http://images6.fanpop.com/image/photos/32100000/DBZ-Memes-dragon-ball-z-32173158-499-412.jpg

You forgot that Krillin would also somehow die in the process.

http://i.imgur.com/SLfZM.jpg?b
That was awesome i didnt like that it didnt make sense but it was awesome forget everyone elses galaxies mine is here so we can crush the rest and make kamehameha's out of em

Space frisbee was the best part

the entire series was ridiculous, and that was the icing on the cake!

some anime is good; a lot of it, like a lot of any other medium, is awful.

I really wish, though, that fewer premises could get ruined by harem tropes. it's overdone at this point.

i love anime and i actually agree. Ruins our lives as much as LoL.
But if u play LoL anyway, then idk what to tell ya

...or if u r talking about quality of anime, disagreed due to some outlier ones that are actually good

I actually don't have an opinion either way; I don't watch any anime, this is just a troll quote from some anime directer that became a meme. 

Google "anime was a mistake."
Especially dubbed anime. :^)
https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/09497d67cb6d4a76f4bc99c1520490b829d9188cbcf355dbce613a0f077bec6c.jpg

Japanese Goku and Vegeta have too high pitched voices. 

I prefer dub but I enjoy subs if the dub is beyond atrocious.

Oh yeah. Sean Schemmel is the only Goku.

I personally watch dubs only because i like to watch anime, not watch and read.
The reading just becomes subconscious at some point.  Now if there's ever text in a video, I automatically read through it.  It doesn't really get in the way to me anymore.
